name: Mr. Fishbones
description:
Jump as the charming Penguin Mr. Fishbones over over icy water while collecting Keys along the way in this short 3D Platformer.  How fast can you make it to the end of each world ? 

10 - 30 minutes of Playtime,  with 13 diverse Levels in increasing difficulty.

Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACE - JUMP

ESC - PAUSE
